episodes.overview: During Valentine's Day, Thomas and Rosie try to avoid each other after Diesel, Bill and Ben tease them for being "special friends", but they must come through their fears when Sir Topham Hatt asks them both to prepare his Valentine's Day surprise for Lady Hatt at Vicarstown.

episodes.name: The Case of the Puzzling Parts
episodes.overview: Sidney is shunting a flatbed of engine parts, but he cannot remember what he is supposed to be doing with them since Diesel jolted his memory. Paxton thinks this sounds like a kind of mystery that can only be solved by a Special Agent.

episodes.name: Banjo and the Bushfire
episodes.overview: Thomas offers a lift to a ranger named Ranger Jill while working in the Australian Rain Forest. Thomas is excited to learn from her about all the animals that live there, but he is too loud and impatient to be very useful.

episodes.name: Counting on Nia
episodes.overview: Nia is a really clever engine and knows about all sorts of things, but when the Fat Controller asks her to take Annie and Clarabel and pick up passengers from Knapford Station to Thomas' Branch line, Nia has great trouble reading numbers so Annie and Clarabel teach her.

episodes.name: Hunt the Truck
episodes.overview: Bill and Ben's latest game consists of hiding trucks and making other engines look for them. But when the twins hide a van full of Sir Robert Norramby's Christmas supplies for Edward to collect, they try to return it, but have to travel all over Sodor to look for it.

episodes.name: Free the Roads
episodes.overview: Bulgy thinks that all passengers should travel by bus and not rail until he learns that having so many passengers is not easy for the buses on their own.

episodes.name: Crowning Around
episodes.overview: Rajiv learns that he can be really useful with or without his crown.

episodes.name: Chucklesome Trucks
episodes.overview: Rebecca defies expectations from Thomas, Percy & James when she works with the Troublesome Trucks and has a very amusing day.

episodes.name: The Other Big Engine
episodes.overview: Thomas meets another big blue engine that reminds him of Gordon on his first day in Brazil.

episodes.name: Heart of Gold
episodes.overview: Some rude passengers make fun of Toby while working at Ulfstead Castle but he soon proves some them wrong when he saves the crown.

episodes.name: Batucada
episodes.overview: Thomas finds a way to take part in the Brazilian carnival music.

episodes.name: Gordon Gets the Giggles
episodes.overview: Gordon becomes worried when he gets a serious case of the giggles.

episodes.name: Thomas Makes a Mistake
episodes.overview: Thomas causes confusion and delay by not seeking help when he makes mistakes on the Indian Railway.

episodes.name: Diesel Do Right
episodes.overview: Diesel plays a trick on Rebecca to try to get the other diesels in trouble for a change.

episodes.name: Grudge Match
episodes.overview: Raul wants to beat Thomas in a game, but his competitive nature soon gets him into trouble.

episodes.name: Panicky Percy
episodes.overview: Percy causes confusion and delay by panicking when he thinks Thomas had an accident.

episodes.name: Laid Back Shane
episodes.overview: Shane has too much fun to stop and refuel until he runs out of coal and gets stranded on the Australian Railway.

episodes.name: Rangers of the Rails
episodes.overview: Emily takes the Sodor Rangers camping but gets derailed, but also spends the night with Nia during her accident.

episodes.name: Wish You Were Here
episodes.overview: Thomas misses Percy while working on the Chinese Railway.

episodes.name: Out of Site
episodes.overview: Brenda learns that it is important to work as a team and not just care about her own jobs.

episodes.name: First Day on Sodor!
episodes.overview: Darcy makes some mistakes on her first day, but she soon makes up for it when everyone sees what she can really do.

episodes.name: Lorenzo's Solo
episodes.overview: Lorenzo gets lost when he leaves Beppe behind to take Dame Bella Canto to a concert alone.

episodes.name: Deep Trouble
episodes.overview: Monty's antics on a construction site get him into trouble.

episodes.name: Too Loud, Thomas!
episodes.overview: Thomas attempts to sing opera and loses his voice, when he must pass on a message.

episodes.name: Diesel Glows Away
episodes.overview: When Diesel hides from the other engines, his plans backfire and he gets a surprise.

episodes.name: Steam Team to the Rescue
episodes.overview: The Steam Team must work overtime to unload cargo from the docks when a series of accidents put all of the diesel engines out of action and Percy is stuck working on his own.

episodes.name: All Tracks Lead to Rome
episodes.overview: Thomas is keen to prove to his new friend Gina that he is an expert in all things Italian, until he gets lost down an old mine on his first day in Italy.

episodes.name: Mines of Mystery
episodes.overview: Thomas wants to impress his friends by finding an amazing discovery. It is not long before his wish is granted, although not in the way he had expected.

episodes.name: Emily's Best Friend
episodes.overview: Emily worries that she does not have a best friend, but when the other engines help her out of a tricky situation, she realizes she has been surrounded by best friends all along.

episodes.name: Thomas' Fuzzy Friend
episodes.overview: Thomas discovers a missing dog on the railway and tries to find it a new home.

episodes.name: The Great Little Railway Show
episodes.overview: When a Railway Show for little engines comes to Sodor, an overly excited Percy finally sees his chance to shine.

episodes.name: Thomas and the Forest Engines
episodes.overview: In Brazil, Thomas meets two wood-burning engines who have never traveled beyond their eucalyptus railway. Thomas agrees to swap jobs with them for the day, but this causes more trouble than he expects.

episodes.name: Emily to the Rescue
episodes.overview: When a pretend emergency turns into a real emergency, Emily comes to the rescue.

episodes.name: Shankar's Makeover
episodes.overview: Thomas pushes Shankar into entering the Fancy Costume Contest, even though Shankar does not want the spotlight on him.

episodes.name: Nia and the Unfriendly Elephant
episodes.overview: Nia is bringing an elephant to the Sodor Animal Park, but the elephant does not like steam engines.

episodes.name: James the Super Engine
episodes.overview: When Rebecca tells James he could be a comic-book super-engine, he takes her seriously, and Rail Rocket is born.

episodes.name: Thomas' Not-So-Lucky Day
episodes.overview: When Thomas has a run of bad luck, he tries everything to get back on track, even if it means following Lorenzo's strange, superstitious advice.

episodes.name: Ace's Brave Jump
episodes.overview: Thomas helps his friend Ace overcome his fear of animals so that he can compete in the Super Stunt Rally.

episodes.name: Nia's Bright Idea
episodes.overview: Nia uses what she learns about lighthouses to suggest covering a big wheel in Christmas lights so that Harold can see where he is going in a storm.

episodes.name: Cleo's First Snow
episodes.overview: Cleo is shocked to learn snow does not last forever and tries to stop it from melting.

episodes.name: Sonny's Second Chance
episodes.overview: Sonny is trying to prove himself to be a useful engine so that he can stay working on Sodor, but Diesel seems to be the only engine who can trust him.

episodes.name: Thomas and the Inventor's Workshop
episodes.overview: Thomas helps Ruth fix up an old windmill into her new, energy-efficient workshop.

episodes.name: The Inventor's Spectacular Bridge
episodes.overview: When the Rickety Old Bridge collapses, trapping Toby and Henrietta on the other side of the ravine, Inventor Ruth is asked to build a new one.

episodes.name: Yong Bao and the Tiger
episodes.overview: Yong Bao tells Thomas the story of how he came to have a magnificent tiger emblem on his tender.

episodes.name: Gordon and Rebecca, Coming Through!
episodes.overview: Gordon and Rebecca do the same work, but they go about it differently. When Rebecca tries to be more like Gordon, things do not go well for the big blue engine.

episodes.name: Kenji on the Rails Again
episodes.overview: When Kenji hears that he must travel home to Japan alone, he gets scared and tries to hide, so Thomas sets out to find him.

episodes.name: Cleo the Road Engine
episodes.overview: When Ruth's new car, Cleo, takes to the rails to race Thomas, she soon discovers why she is designed to stick to the roads.

episodes.name: Thomas' Animal Friends
episodes.overview: Thomas is asked to help at the animal park for the day and realises there is more to the job than he first thought.

episodes.name: Thomas and the Royal Engine
episodes.overview: Thomas is selected to take the Fat Controller to London for a Royal Appointment, but with no knowledge of how to get there, their journey is filled with confusion and delay.

episodes.name: A New Arrival
episodes.overview: When Thomas finds out that the Earl's Technology Fair will bring new inventions to Sodor, he sets out to prove that steam engines are the best inventions ever.

episodes.name: World of Tomorrow
episodes.overview: When a pair of crooks steal the plans for a great new invention, there is a high-speed chase to try and get them back.
